decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information that the proposed development would achieve a 19% reduction in C02 compared to 2013 part L Regulations and internal water useage rates of 105 l/p/day and would fail the requirements of Condition 7 of planning permission 17/10328/FUL. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policies 5.2 and 5.3 of the London Plan 2015 and Policy DM1 (Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
